overview_of_class: For ISP students and (prospective) chemistry majors. Molecular modeling, unknown identification by spectroscopic methods, and experimental techniques of modern chemistry emphasizing reactions of alkanes, alkenes, alkyl halides, alcohols, and carbonyls. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 212-1.
name: Organic Chemistry Laboratory I
title: WCAS CHEM 232-1-01 Organic Chemistry Laboratory I
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 212-1.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: For ISP students and (prospective) chemistry majors. Molecular modeling, unknown identification by spectroscopic methods, and experimental techniques of modern chemistry emphasizing reactions of alkanes, alkenes, alkyl halides, alcohols, and carbonyls. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 212-1.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: 103 or 172 (C- or better) or equivalent; AP score of 5; IB score of 7; or qualifying score on the Chemistry Placement Exam (available only to incoming first-year students).

Students enrolled in Chemistry 212-1 must also enroll in Chemistry 232-1.
Students enrolled in Chemistry 232-1 must also enroll in Chemistry 212-1.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)
2. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

These items will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
